plot: During the holidays, a recent widower and struggling children's book author makes one last push for his career while trying to take care of his two little girls.
title: The Heroes of Arvine Place
plot_es: During the holidays, a recent widower and struggling children's book author makes one last push for his career while trying to take care of his two little girls.
plot_en: During the holidays, a recent widower and struggling children's book author makes one last push for his career while trying to take care of his two little girls.
